headline: Family Fun Shrinks for Summer with Lil McDonald's
summary: For years, the Golden Arches' youngest fans have turned living rooms into drive-thrus and backyard playhouses into McDonald's kitchens, serving smiles with a side of imagination. This summer, we're bringing fans the make-believe magic they love with the Lil McDonald's Happy Meal®, available nationwide starting July 1.
